comments:
-adding a note to a java class shape causes exceptions to be logged, renders environment in unstable state

-create a new java project, package, class
-visualize java class in viz class diagram
-select the java shape, right click, add note
-exceptions appended

Fixed. Added protection code to CreateElementRequest so that it does not try to get the editing domain for the container when the container is null.

New unit test in org.eclipse.gmf.tests.runtime.emf.type.core
